name: Edmon Taigne Journey
description:
Basic Movement : Arrow Keys
Play in FullScreen

Edmon Taigne Journey

Edmon Taigne Journey is a game made during Game Off, a Game Jam organized by Github.

« Me ? All I want is to fly. »

Ed is a little caterpillar who dreams of meeting the sky.
From the top of the surrounding trees, he jumps and tries day after day to stay in the air as long as possible.
After a fall faster than the others, Ed decides to climb the mountain he can see in the distance to do the biggest jump ever and and to finaly realize his dream.
